name: Rocket booster (Marthian80)
description:
A simple rocket flying game I created following the Unity3D course on Gamedev.tv

You control the rocket with the spacebar and the A+D keys for steering it. Goal is to land on the green platform and avoid the obstacles. 

Don't know when and if I continue to work on this one. Could expand this idea with powerups and a fuel bar that runs out.
